trends: There has been one other sighting in Evanston
There were no other sightings in Evanston on or around September 30th 2001
Summary: silvery stationay object seen in daylight
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outdoors at the skateboard park with my son. There were about 20 peoplepresent. I looked into the NNE sky to see the airplanes approachibg Ohare.Thiswas about 3:15 pm on Sunday. I noticed a bright stationary light NNE about 35degrees. It appeared to br flashing or reflecting sunlight. I called this to theattention of all present.We observed this object hover for about 20 minutes. itseemed to get dimmer or move very very slowly to the east over LakeMichigan.The wind was blowing to the SE. We observed several airplanes go infront of the object from our perspective. A youngster had a video camera. Hezoomed in on it and noted it seemed to be a halo shape with a bright lightemminating from the top and bottem. Much like a gyroscope. As the airplanesmoved away, this object remained hovering. It made no sound.
